channel.title: Digital Events Podfolio
channel.itunes:author: Digital Events
channel.description: Video Podcast portfolio of Digital Events - Film • Motion • Design. Digital Events specializes in film and video production, creative editing, broadcast motion graphics, and advanced DVD authoring for film, television and corporate clientele. From concept to completion we are only limited by our ideas. Cutting edge solutions, highly creative staff, advanced software and hardware, on-time deadlines, digital proofing, and free consultations. Visit us and see how digital media can help your business.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Video Podcast portfolio of Digital Events - Film • Motion • Design. Digital Events specializes in film and video production, creative editing, broadcast motion graphics, and advanced DVD authoring for film, television and corporate clientele.
channel.itunes:summary: Video Podcast portfolio of Digital Events - Film • Motion • Design. Digital Events specializes in film and video production, creative editing, broadcast motion graphics, and advanced DVD authoring for film, television and corporate clientele. From concept to completion we are only limited by our ideas. Cutting edge solutions, highly creative staff, advanced software and hardware, on-time deadlines, digital proofing, and free consultations. Visit us and see how digital media can help your business.
channel.itunes:keywords: video production film denver LODO dvd authoring design FX VFX motion graphics

item.title: Ubee Brand Transition
item.itunes:author: Digital Events
item.description: WOW Branding contracted DE to conceptualize and produce this 40sec HD brand transition spot. Designed for both web presence and environmental display at industry expos, this spot combines custom sound design, Cinema 4D animation, Thinking Particles, 2.5D animation and compositing into a fun underwater visualization of the brand transition from Ambit Microsystems to Ubee Interactive. Let's make it easy.
item.itunes:subtitle: Combining custom sound design, Cinema 4D animation, Thinking Particles, 2.5D animation and compositing, DE created this fun underwater visualization of the brand transition from Ambit Microsystems to Ubee Interactive.
item.itunes:summary: WOW Branding contracted DE to conceptualize and produce this 40sec HD brand transition spot. Designed for both web presence and environmental display at industry expos, this spot combines custom sound design, Cinema 4D animation, Thinking Particles, 2.5D animation and compositing into a fun underwater visualization of the brand transition from Ambit Microsystems to Ubee Interactive. Let's make it easy.
item.itunes:keywords: video production film denver LODO dvd authoring design FX VFX motion graphics

item.description: "Rocket" combined 3D and 2.5D animation using still photography. DE provided conceptual storyboards, motion design, custom score, and sound design in this :30 second TV spot for the Nebraska-based home builder, Hearthstone Homes.

item.title: Hearthstone Homes - Your Story
item.itunes:author: Digital Events
item.description: Hearthstone Homes is one of the largest home developers in Omaha Nebraska, and if you're a major player in the residential or commercial development industry you go to Milesbrand for your creative heavy lifting. "Your Story" called for 2D animation and still photography. DE provided production support with conceptual storyboards, producing, directing, edit, motion, custom score, and sound design for this :30 second TV spot.

item.title: Scion Dealer Event
item.itunes:author: Digital Events
item.description: The project was based on O2's script and called for a hybrid of custom motion gfx, modeling, character animation, compositing, stop-motion, voice-over and sound design. The final presentation was displayed 200ft. X 40ft. yielding it's unique aspect ratio. This is a condensed version to show the overall look and feel of the piece.
item.itunes:subtitle: O2 Creative Solutions collaborated with Digital Events to conceptualize and produce a ten minute 'mediascape' for the 2007 Scion Dealer Showcase Event in Hawaii.
item.itunes:summary: The project was based on O2's script and called for a hybrid of custom motion gfx, modeling, character animation, compositing, stop-motion, voice-over and sound design. The final presentation was displayed 200ft. X 40ft. yielding it's unique aspect ratio. This is a condensed version to show the overall look and feel of the piece.
item.itunes:keywords: video production film denver LODO dvd authoring design FX VFX motion graphics
